Class SeekableInputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      java.io.FilterInputStream
          co.cask.tigon.io.SeekableInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Seekable
public abstract class SeekableInputStream
extends FilterInputStream
implements org.apache.hadoop.fs.Seekable

Abstract base class for InputStream that implements the Seekable interface.

Method Detail

create

public static SeekableInputStream create(InputStream input)
                                  throws IOException
Creates a SeekableInputStream from the given InputStream. Exception will be thrown if failed to do so.

Throws:
IOException - If the given input stream is not seekable.
